name: Roll, Pizza Ball!
description:
The best pizza yolo in the world risks his life every day to make the best pizza.

Make your pizza while the ingredients fight for their life!

Controls:

w: push the ball

a,d: turn

p: restart the level

It seems like there is a bug at the start of the second level where you clip in the ground in the webGl build. You need to move for it not to happen.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021, theme: "joined together"

yes i completly stole an ost from Doom. (The only thing they fear is you by Mick Gordon from Doom Eternal) Better than developper music am i right?
